pkgmetadata.longdescription: Prediction Intervals for Synthetic Control Methods // Implementation of estimation and inference procedures for Synthetic Control methods using least square, lasso, ridge, or simplex-type constraints. Uncertainty is quantified with prediction intervals as developed in Cattaneo, Feng, and Titiunik (2021) https://cattaneo.princeton.edu/papers/Cattaneo- Feng-Titiunik_2021_JASA.pdf.
